download.title: Deasaiche far loidhne Scratch 2.0
download.intro: ’S urrainn dhut Deasaiche Scratch 2.0 a stàladh gus obair air pròiseactan gun cheangal dhan eadar-lìon. Obraichidh an tionndadh seo air Mac, Windows, agus cuid a thionndaidhean de Linux (32 bit).
download.introMac: Note for Mac Users: the latest version of Scratch 2.0 Offline requires Adobe AIR 20. To upgrade to Adobe AIR 20 manually, go here.
download.airBody: Mur eil e agad mar-thà, luchdaidh a-nuas agus stàlaich Adobe AIR
download.offlineEditorBody: An uairsin, luchdaich a-nuas an deasaiche far loidhne Scratch 2.0.
download.supportMaterialsBody: A bheil taic a dhìth ort airson toiseach-tòiseachaidh? Seo goireasan feumail dhut.
download.updatesBody: Nì an deasaiche far loidhne ùrachadh gu fèin-obrachail (ma tha na ceadan cleachdaiche aige). Bheir e sùil airson ùrachaidhean nuair a thòisicheas e agus ’s urrainn dhut an àithne “Thoir sùil airson ùrachaidhean” sa chlàr-taice “Faidhle” a chleachdadh cuideachd.
download.otherVersionsOlder: Ma tha seann-choimpiutair agad no mur urrainn dhut an deasaiche far loidhne Scratch 2.0 a stàladh, feuch an stàlaich thu Scratch 1.4.
download.otherVersionsAdmin: Ma tha tu nad rianaire lìonraidh: Chaidh MSI airson Scratch 2.0 MSI a chruthachadh is tha e ga ghlèidheadh le ball na coimhearsnachd agus ga òstadh a chum luchdadh a-nuas gu poblach created and maintained by a member of the community and hosted for public download an-seo.
download.knownIssuesOne: If your offline editor is crashing directly after Scratch is opened, install the Scratch 2 offline editor again (see step 2 above). This issue is due to a bug introduced in Adobe AIR version 14 (released April 2014).
download.knownIssuesTwo: Dh’fhaoidte gun cuir blocaichean èifeachdan grafaigeachd (san earrann “Coltas”) maille air pròiseactan ri linn buga ann am Flash.
download.knownIssuesThree: Chan eil a’ mhàla-droma ri fhaighinn fhathast.
download.knownIssuesFour: On Mac OS you may see a prompt indicating that "Scratch 2 is trying to install a new helper tool" and asking for your user name and password. We are currently investigating a solution to this problem.
download.reportBugs: Dèan aithris air bugaichean is mearachdan-obrachaidh
download.notAvailable: Tha coltas nach eil na luchdaidhean a-nuas ri am faighinn an-dràsta – ath-nuadhaich an duilleag gus feuchainn ris a-rithist.
